# pymacaron-gcp

A deployment pipeline for pymacaron microservices, deploying them as Docker
containers on Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) or Google Cloud Run (GCR).

See more at [pymacaron.com](http://pymacaron.com/gcp.html)
